alert.note: Alert for Mahaska; Marion (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 17 at 8:33PM CDT until September 18 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR MARION AND SOUTHWESTERN MAHASKA COUNTIES... At 833 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Harvey, or near Pella, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Bussey and Leighton around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Beacon and Oskaloosa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
